title: Stay on path: PCA along graph paths
abstract: We introduce a variant of (sparse) PCA in which the set of feasible support sets is determined by a graph. In particular, we consider the following setting: given a directed acyclic graph $G$ on $p$ vertices corresponding to variables, the non-zero entries of the extracted principal component must coincide with vertices lying along a path in $G$.
histories: 12 pages, 5 figures, In Proceedings of International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML) 2015
